publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5978.2Patrick Harvie:Climate Changeâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-5978) in the name of Sarah Boyack, insert at end "; also opposes new unabated coal power capacity, and therefore calls on the Scottish Government to reject plans to build a new coal-fired power station at Hunterston, given that large-scale carbon capture and storage at existing coal or gas plants has never been successfully demonstrated."
